org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.data

Class Material

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.cdnomlqko.jglutil.data.Material
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Bufferable

    public class Material
extends java.lang.Object
implements Bufferable
    This class holds the properties of a material for an object, made to be passed to shaders.
    Author:
    CDnoMlqko

      • getSceneBufferOffset

        public int getSceneBufferOffset()
        offset in the Scene lights buffer where the object is written.
        Returns:
        -1 if no GameObject with this material is registered in a Scene, otherwise an integer between 0 and the length of the OpenGL buffer getSceneBuffer()

      • getSceneBuffer

        public int getSceneBuffer()
        the Scene lights buffer where the object is written.
        Returns:
